name: Balloonist
description: Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type, until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]
first_night_desc: Choose a character type. Point to a player whose character is of that type. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
other_night_desc: Choose a character type that does not yet have a Seen reminder next to a character of that type. Point to a player whose character is of that type, if there are any. Place the Balloonist's Seen reminder next to that character.
